title: FDGANet: Frequency dynamic graph attention network for undersampled MRI reconstruction
details: Y Xie, D Xiong, H Zhao, H Zhou, BWK Ling, X Zhang - Biomedical Signal Processing …, 2025
abstract: Undersampled magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) aims at reconstructing high- quanlity MR images from undersampled measurements, which plays a crucial role for accelerated MRI. Deep learning methods have shown great superiority in …

title: Stochastic co-teaching for robust cardiac segmentation in ultrasound with noisy labels
details: G Jansen, M Schuuring, B Bouma, I Isgum - Medical Imaging with Deep Learning …, 2025
abstract: In this work, we propose a label noise-robust segmentation framework for left ventricle blood pool segmentation in echocardiography. Based on the stochastic co- teaching approach, our method extends pixel-level filtering of label noise with …
